description: Sam Adams letter to Richard Henry Lee... The liberties of all, are alike invaded by the same haughty power.
Sam Adams letter to Richard Henry Lee... The unrighteous and oppressive act of the British Parliament for shutting up this harbour ... has hitherto failed
Sam Adams letter to Richard Henry Lee... General Howe, as you have heard, is arrived at New York. He has brought with him from eight to ten thousand troops.
